70260.「ここは 三門の関所だ。\n この扉から出て コニウェア平原を抜けると\n ココ:
This is the Three Way Gate. If you exit through this
gate and go through Coniware Plain, you will reach
Cocolata Beach.

70165.「ここは 三門の関所。\n グランゼドーラ王国は この門の向こうですが\n 誰も:
This is the Three Way Gate. Beyond this gate is Gran
Zedora Castle, but we have orders not to let anyone
through.

70166.<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>「くそっ！ どう:
Damn! What's going on? The gates to Gran Zedora have never been closed before! Normally, they let anyone through. What
happened to Gran Zedora? Is my family safe?

75031.<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>「旅人を通してく:
<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>The princess of Gran Zedora must be very cold-
hearted if she won't let a traveler through. I
wonder what she's up to?

70167.「この門は グランゼドーラ王国の王女\n アンルシアさまの ご命令で 閉ざしてい:
This gate is closed by order of Princess Anlucia of the Gran Zedora Kingdom. This is a painful decision by the princess, who cannot
allow any abnormality to enter Gran Zedora. No matter who she is, she will not let them pass.

70168.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「……ほう。３匹:
Oh, you want to collect three butterflies? I don't know what kind of rare butterflies you are looking for, but you are a curious
traveler to collect insects. In addition to Gran Zedora Kingdom, there is a village called Melsandy, a town called Celed, and a country
called Al-Ahagiro in Lendersia. Leaving here and going east, there is Lake Retreat. You may want to prepare for your trip and explore
Lendersia at the Lake Retreat first.

75032.<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>「せっかく苦労し:
<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>We've worked so hard to get here, but we can't
go to Gran Zedora! We'll wait here until the
gate is open!

70261.扉は かたく 閉ざされている。: The door is locked up tight

70262.「ここは 三門の関所。\n グランゼドーラ王国は この門の向こうですが\n 誰も:
This is the Three Way Gate. Gran Zedora Kingdom is behind this gate, but we have orders not to let anyone through.
Eh, 3 Butterflies...? If you want to collect insects, do it somewhere else. Please, take them away.

70263.「この門は グランゼドーラ王国の王女\n アンルシアさまの ご命令で 閉ざしてい:
This gate is closed by order of Princess Anlucia of the Gran Zedora Kingdom. This is a painful decision by the princess, who cannot
allow any abnormality to enter Gran Zedora. No matter who she is, she cannot allow them to pass. Huh? She brought three butterflies? What
are you talking nonsense? If you have no use for them, get out of my way!

70264.「……なに？ ３匹の蝶があれば\n グランゼドーラへの門が 開かれるだと？\n<:
What? Three butterflies will open the gate to
Gran Zedora? I've never heard of such a thing,
but you should talk to Christoph over there.

70265.「知らなかったとはいえ 失礼いたしました。\n どうぞ お通りください！:
I apologize, even though I didn't know.
Please, come through!

70266.「あんた グランゼドーラへの門を 通れるのか！\n ……頼む！ グランゼドーラに:
Can you get through the gate to Gran Zedora? Please! My family in Gran Zedora. No, let's not. I'm not going to do that. I'll have to
see for myself. I'll find a way to get through the gate.

70267.「あ あなたは……！\n お役目 ご苦労さまです。: Oh, you! Thank you for your service.

70268.「レンダーシアには グランゼドーラ王国の他に\n メルサンディという村 セレドと:
In Lendersia, in addition to Gran Zedora Kingdom, are 3 towns called Melsandy Village, the town of Celed, and Arahaghiro Kingdom.
All of which are peaceful and beautiful. If you have business in any of these 3 towns, you can go out through this door.

75033.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「あ…あんた 門:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>You got through the gate? I've been waiting
here all this time, but it's not fair, it's
not fair! It's not fair!
